AIInsightAction.name: AIInsightAction
AIInsightAction.description: Represents an Einstein prediction insight action.

ActionId.description: The unique ID of the associated action, such as the ID of a Macro.

ActionName.description: The ID of the action. For example, a value of “Case.SendEmail” indicates a send email quick action on Case.

AiRecordInsightId.description: The unique ID of the associated AIRecordInsight.

Confidence.description: Relative confidence strength of the generated prediction insight. Higher values (near 1.0) indicate stronger confidence.

Type.description: The type of action. Possible values are: InvocableAction—Invocable Action Macro—Macro QuickAction—Quick action. StandardAction—Standard Action. An example standard action would be to update a record.
